mapper.select: SELECT CD_DTL_EXP FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND CD_NO = #{cdNo} AND CD_DTL_NO = #{cdDtlNo}
SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND CD_NO = #{cdNo} AND CD_DTL_NO = #{cdDtlNo}

SELECT FILE_NM AS fileNm , FILE_TYPE AS fileType , MODI_DATE AS modiDate , SIZE AS size , USE_YN AS useYn , JOB_STATUS AS jobStatus FROM NVD_META WHERE FILE_TYPE = #{fileType} AND FILE_NM = #{fileNm} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND JOB_STATUS = 'C' AND MODI_DATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NVD_META (FILE_NM, FILE_TYPE, MODI_DATE, SIZE, ZIP_SIZE, GZ_SIZE, SHA256, USE_YN) VALUES (#{fileNm}, #{fileType}, #{modiDate}, #{size}, #{zipSize}, #{gzSize}, #{sha256}, 'Y')

INSERT INTO NVD_META (FILE_NM, FILE_TYPE, MODI_DATE, SIZE, ZIP_SIZE, GZ_SIZE, SHA256, USE_YN, JOB_STATUS) VALUES (#{fileNm}, #{fileType}, #{modiDate}, #{size}, #{zipSize}, #{gzSize}, #{sha256}, 'Y', 'E')
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NM AS fileNm , FILE_TYPE AS fileType , MODI_DATE AS modiDate , SIZE AS size , USE_YN AS useYn , JOB_STATUS AS jobStatus FROM NVD_META WHERE FILE_TYPE = #{fileType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND JOB_STATUS = 'W' ORDER BY MODI_DATE DESC, SIZE DESC

SELECT FILE_NM AS fileNm , FILE_TYPE AS fileType , MODI_DATE AS modiDate , SIZE AS size , USE_YN AS useYn , JOB_STATUS AS jobStatus FROM NVD_META WHERE FILE_TYPE = #{fileType} AND USE_YN = 'N' AND JOB_STATUS = 'D' ORDER BY FILE_NM
SELECT CPE_NM AS cpeNm, TITLE AS title, PART AS part, VENDOR AS vendor, PRODUCT AS product, VERSION AS version, REG_DATE AS regDate FROM NVD_CPE_DICTIONARY WHERE CPE_NM = #{cpeNm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NVD_CPE_DICTIONARY(CPE_NM,TITLE,PART,VENDOR,PRODUCT,VERSION)VALUES(#{cpeNm}, #{title}, #{part}, #{vendor}, #{product}, #{version})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NVD_VULN_SW WHERE CPE_NM = (SELECT CPE_NM FROM NVD_CPE_DICTIONARY WHERE PRODUCT = #{ossName} AND VERSION = #{ossVersion} ORDER BY CPE_NM LIMIT 1)
SELECT CVE_ID AS cveId, PUBL_DATE AS publDate, MODI_DATE AS modiDate FROM NVD_CVE WHERE CVE_ID = #{cveId}

SELECT A.CVE_ID AS cveId , A.CPE_NM AS cpeNm , B.CVSS_SCORE AS cvssScore FROM NVD_VULN_SW A INNER JOIN NVD_CVE B ON A.CVE_ID = B.CVE_ID WHERE A.CPE_NM = (SELECT CPE_NM FROM NVD_CPE_DICTIONARY WHERE PRODUCT = #{ossName} AND VERSION = #{ossVersion} ORDER BY CPE_NM LIMIT 1) ORDER BY CONVERT(B.CVSS_SCORE, DECIMAL) DESC, A.CVE_ID DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NVD_CVE(CVE_ID, PUBL_DATE, MODI_DATE, CVSS_SCORE, CVSS_ACC_VECTOR, CVSS_ACC_COMPLE, CVSS_AUTH, CVSS_CONF_IMPACT, CVSS_INT_IMPACT, CVSS_AVA_IMPACT, CVSS_SOURCE, CVSS_GEN_ON_DATE, VULN_SUMMARY)VALUES (#{cveId}, #{publDate}, #{modiDate}, #{cvssScore}, #{cvssAV}, #{cvssAC}, #{cvssAu}, #{cvssC}, #{cvssI}, #{cvssA}, #{cvssSource}, #{cvssGenDate}, #{summary})
INSERT INTO NVD_VULN_SW(CVE_ID, CPE_NM)VALUES(#{cveId}, #{cpeNm})
mapper.select: UPDATE OSS_MASTER SET VULN_YN = NULL, VULN_DATE = NULL, CVE_ID = NULL WHERE VULN_YN = 'N'

SELECT T2.OSS_ID AS ossId, T1.CVE_ID AS cveId, T1.CVSS_SCORE AS cvssScore, T1.MODI_DATE AS modiDate FROM ( SELECT B1.CVE_ID, B1.VENDOR, B1.PRODUCT, B1.VERSION, B1.MODI_DATE, B2.CVSS_SCORE FROM NVD_DATA B1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT A1.VENDOR, A1.PRODUCT, A1.VERSION, MAX(A1.CVSS_SCORE) AS CVSS_SCORE FROM NVD_DATA A1 GROUP BY A1.VENDOR, A1.PRODUCT, A1.VERSION ) B2 ON B1.VENDOR = B2.VENDOR AND B1.PRODUCT = B2.PRODUCT AND B1.VERSION = B2.VERSION AND B1.CVSS_SCORE = B2.CVSS_SCORE ) T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT M1.OSS_ID, M1.OSS_NAME, M1.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M1 WHERE M1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M1.VULN_YN IS NULL UNION SELECT M2.OSS_ID, M2.OSS_NICKNAME AS OSS_NAME, M2.OSS_VERSION FROM ( SELECT M21.OSS_ID, M22.OSS_NICKNAME, M21.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M21 INNER JOIN OSS_NICKNAME M22 ON M21.OSS_NAME = M22.OSS_NAME WHERE M21.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M21.VULN_YN IS NULL ) M2 ) T2 ON T1.PRODUCT = T2.OSS_NAME AND T1.VERSION = T2.OSS_VERSION

SELECT T2.OSS_ID AS ossId, T1.CVE_ID AS cveId, MAX(T1.CVSS_SCORE) AS cvssScore, T1.MODI_DATE AS modiDate FROM ( SELECT B1.CVE_ID, B1.VENDOR, B1.PRODUCT, B1.VERSION, B1.MODI_DATE, B2.CVSS_SCORE FROM NVD_DATA B1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT A1.VENDOR, A1.PRODUCT, A1.VERSION, MAX(A1.CVSS_SCORE) AS CVSS_SCORE FROM NVD_DATA A1 GROUP BY A1.VENDOR, A1.PRODUCT, A1.VERSION ) B2 ON B1.VENDOR = B2.VENDOR AND B1.PRODUCT = B2.PRODUCT AND B1.VERSION = B2.VERSION AND B1.CVSS_SCORE = B2.CVSS_SCORE ) T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT M1.OSS_ID, M1.OSS_NAME, M1.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M1 WHERE M1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M1.VULN_YN IS NULL AND IFNULL(M1.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' UNION SELECT M2.OSS_ID, M2.OSS_NICKNAME AS OSS_NAME, M2.OSS_VERSION FROM ( SELECT M21.OSS_ID, M22.OSS_NICKNAME, M21.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M21 INNER JOIN OSS_NICKNAME M22 ON M21.OSS_NAME = M22.OSS_NAME WHERE M21.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M21.VULN_YN IS NULL AND IFNULL(M21.OSS_VERSION, '') = '') M2 ) T2 ON T1.PRODUCT = T2.OSS_NAME GROUP BY ossId
mapper.update: UPDATE OSS_MASTER SET CVSS_SCORE = #{cvssScore}, VULN_YN = 'Y', VULN_DATE = NOW(), CVE_ID = #{cveId} WHERE OSS_ID = #{ossId}
UPDATE OSS_MASTER SET VULN_YN = #{vulnYn}, VULN_DATE = NOW() WHERE OSS_ID = #{ossId}
UPDATE NVD_META SET JOB_STATUS = 'G', USE_YN = 'N' WHERE FILE_TYPE = #{fileType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND JOB_STATUS = 'W' AND REG_DATE < DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -30 MINUTE)
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NM AS fileNm , FILE_TYPE AS fileType , MODI_DATE AS modiDate , SIZE AS size , USE_YN AS useYn , JOB_STATUS AS jobStatus FROM NVD_META WHERE FILE_TYPE = #{fileType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND JOB_STATUS = 'L' ORDER BY FILE_NM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_TEMP SELECT C.CVE_ID, D.VENDOR, D.PRODUCT, D.VERSION, D.TITLE, C.CVSS_SCORE, C.VULN_SUMMARY, IFNULL(C.MODI_DATE, C.PUBL_DATE) FROM NVD_CVE C INNER JOIN ( SELECT T2.CVE_ID, T1.VENDOR, T1.PRODUCT, T1.VERSION, T1.TITLE FROM NVD_CPE_DICTIONARY T1 INNER JOIN NVD_VULN_SW T2 ON T1.CPE_NM = T2.CPE_NM GROUP BY T2.CVE_ID, T1.VENDOR, T1.PRODUCT, T1.VERSION ) D ON C.CVE_ID = D.CVE_ID
INSERT INTO NVD_DATA SELECT * FROM NVD_DATA_TEMP
INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_SCORE SELECT CVE_ID, PRODUCT, VERSION, MAX(CVSS_SCORE) FROM NVD_DATA GROUP BY PRODUCT, VERSION
mapper.select: SELECT CVE_ID AS cveId, PUBL_DATE AS publDate, MODI_DATE AS modiDate, CVSS_SCORE AS cvssScore FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE CVE_ID = #{cveId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NVD_CVE_V3(CVE_ID, PUBL_DATE, MODI_DATE, CVSS_SCORE, VULN_SUMMARY, BASE_METRIC)VALUES (#{cveId}, #{publDate}, #{modiDate}, #{cvssScore}, #{summary}, #{baseMetric})
INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_V3(CVE_ID, PRODUCT, VERSION)VALUES (#{cveId}, #{product}, #{version}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CVE_ID = #{cveId}, PRODUCT = #{product}, VERSION = #{version}

INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_V3 (CVE_ID, PRODUCT, VERSION) VALUES
(#{item.cveId}, #{item.product}, #{item.version})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CVE_ID = values(cve_id), PRODUCT = values(product), VERSION = values(version)

INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_TEMP_V3 SELECT RTN.PRODUCT, RTN.VERSION, RTN.CVE_ID, TEMP.CVSS_SCORE, RTN.VULN_SUMMARY, RTN.MODI_DATE FROM ( SELECT T32.PRODUCT, T32.VERSION, T31.CVE_ID, T31.CVSS_SCORE, T31.VULN_SUMMARY, T31.MODI_DATE FROM NVD_CVE_V3 T31 INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_V3 T32 ON T31.CVE_ID = T32.CVE_ID ) RTN INNER JOIN ( SELECT A1.PRODUCT, A1.VERSION, MAX(A1.CVE_ID) AS CVE_ID, A1.CVSS_SCORE FROM ( SELECT T12.PRODUCT, T12.VERSION, T11.CVE_ID, T11.CVSS_SCORE FROM NVD_CVE_V3 T11 INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_V3 T12 ON T11.CVE_ID = T12.CVE_ID) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T21.PRODUCT, T21.VERSION, MAX(T22.CVSS_SCORE) AS CVSS_SCORE FROM NVD_DATA_V3 T21 INNER JOIN NVD_CVE_V3 T22 ON T21.CVE_ID = T22.CVE_ID GROUP BY T21.PRODUCT, VERSION ) A2 ON A1.PRODUCT = A2.PRODUCT AND A1.VERSION = A2.VERSION AND A1.CVSS_SCORE = A2.CVSS_SCORE GROUP BY PRODUCT, VERSION ) TEMP ON RTN.PRODUCT = TEMP.PRODUCT AND RTN.VERSION = TEMP.VERSION AND RTN.CVE_ID = TEMP.CVE_ID
INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 SELECT * FROM NVD_DATA_TEMP_V3
mapper.select: SELECT T2.OSS_ID AS ossId, T1.CVE_ID AS cveId, T1.CVSS_SCORE AS cvssScore, T1.MODI_DATE AS modiDate FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT M1.OSS_ID, M1.OSS_NAME, M1.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M1 WHERE M1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M1.VULN_YN IS NULL UNION SELECT M2.OSS_ID, M2.OSS_NICKNAME AS OSS_NAME, M2.OSS_VERSION FROM ( SELECT M21.OSS_ID, M22.OSS_NICKNAME, M21.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M21 INNER JOIN OSS_NICKNAME M22 ON M21.OSS_NAME = M22.OSS_NAME WHERE M21.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M21.VULN_YN IS NULL ) M2 ) T2 ON T1.PRODUCT = T2.OSS_NAME AND T1.VERSION = T2.OSS_VERSION

SELECT T2.OSS_ID AS ossId, T1.CVE_ID AS cveId, MAX(T1.CVSS_SCORE) AS cvssScore, T1.MODI_DATE AS modiDate FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT M1.OSS_ID, M1.OSS_NAME, M1.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M1 WHERE M1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M1.VULN_YN IS NULL AND IFNULL(M1.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' UNION SELECT M2.OSS_ID, M2.OSS_NICKNAME AS OSS_NAME, M2.OSS_VERSION FROM ( SELECT M21.OSS_ID, M22.OSS_NICKNAME, M21.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M21 INNER JOIN OSS_NICKNAME M22 ON M21.OSS_NAME = M22.OSS_NAME WHERE M21.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M21.VULN_YN IS NULL AND IFNULL(M21.OSS_VERSION, '') = '') M2 ) T2 ON T1.PRODUCT = T2.OSS_NAME GROUP BY ossId

SELECT T2.OSS_ID AS ossId, T1.CVE_ID AS cveId, T1.CVSS_SCORE AS cvssScore, T1.MODI_DATE AS modiDate FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT M1.OSS_ID, M1.OSS_NAME, M1.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M1 WHERE M1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M1.VULN_DATE IS NOT NULL AND M1.VULN_DATE < '2019-01-01' UNION SELECT M2.OSS_ID, M2.OSS_NICKNAME AS OSS_NAME, M2.OSS_VERSION FROM ( SELECT M21.OSS_ID, M22.OSS_NICKNAME, M21.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M21 INNER JOIN OSS_NICKNAME M22 ON M21.OSS_NAME = M22.OSS_NAME WHERE M21.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M21.VULN_DATE IS NOT NULL AND M21.VULN_DATE < '2019-01-01' ) M2 ) T2 ON T1.PRODUCT = T2.OSS_NAME AND T1.VERSION = T2.OSS_VERSION

SELECT T2.OSS_ID AS ossId, T1.CVE_ID AS cveId, MAX(T1.CVSS_SCORE) AS cvssScore, T1.MODI_DATE AS modiDate FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT M1.OSS_ID, M1.OSS_NAME, M1.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M1 WHERE M1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M1.VULN_DATE IS NOT NULL AND M1.VULN_DATE < '2019-01-01' AND IFNULL(M1.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' UNION SELECT M2.OSS_ID, M2.OSS_NICKNAME AS OSS_NAME, M2.OSS_VERSION FROM ( SELECT M21.OSS_ID, M22.OSS_NICKNAME, M21.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER M21 INNER JOIN OSS_NICKNAME M22 ON M21.OSS_NAME = M22.OSS_NAME WHERE M21.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M21.VULN_DATE IS NOT NULL AND M21.VULN_DATE < '2019-01-01' AND IFNULL(M21.OSS_VERSION, '') = '') M2 ) T2 ON T1.PRODUCT = T2.OSS_NAME GROUP BY ossId

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (SELECT NICK.OSS_NAME, NVD1.VERSION, NVD1.VENDOR, NVD1.CVE_ID, NVD1.CVSS_SCORE, NVD1.VULN_SUMMARY, now() AS MODI_DATE FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD1 ON NICK.OSS_NICKNAME = NVD1.PRODUCT LEFT JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD2 ON NICK.OSS_NAME = NVD2.PRODUCT AND NVD1.VERSION = NVD2.VERSION WHERE NVD2.PRODUCT IS NULL AND NVD1.VERSION != '-' GROUP BY NVD1.PRODUCT, NVD1.VERSION) RTN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 (PRODUCT, VERSION, VENDOR, CVE_ID, CVSS_SCORE, VULN_SUMMARY, MODI_DATE) SELECT RTN.OSS_NAME, RTN.VERSION, RTN.VENDOR, RTN.CVE_ID, RTN.CVSS_SCORE, RTN.VULN_SUMMARY, RTN.MODI_DATE FROM (SELECT NICK.OSS_NAME, NVD1.VERSION, NVD1.VENDOR, NVD1.CVE_ID, NVD1.CVSS_SCORE, NVD1.VULN_SUMMARY, now() AS MODI_DATE FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD1 ON NICK.OSS_NICKNAME = NVD1.PRODUCT LEFT JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD2 ON NICK.OSS_NAME = NVD2.PRODUCT AND NVD1.VERSION = NVD2.VERSION AND NVD1.VENDOR = NVD2.VENDOR WHERE NVD2.PRODUCT IS NULL AND NVD1.VERSION != '-' GROUP BY NVD1.PRODUCT, NVD1.VERSION) RTN ORDER BY RTN.CVSS_SCORE ASC ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CVE_ID = RTN.CVE_ID , CVSS_SCORE = RTN.CVSS_SCORE , VULN_SUMMARY = RTN.VULN_SUMMARY , MODI_DATE = now()
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (SELECT PRODUCT, VERSION, VENDOR, CVE_ID, CVSS_SCORE, VULN_SUMMARY, MODI_DATE FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 WHERE CONCAT(PRODUCT,'@',CVSS_SCORE) IN (SELECT CONCAT(PRODUCT,'@',MAX(CVSS_SCORE)) AS NVD_KEY FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 GROUP BY PRODUCT) GROUP BY PRODUCT) NVD LEFT JOIN (SELECT PRODUCT, VERSION, VENDOR, CVE_ID, CVSS_SCORE, VULN_SUMMARY, MODI_DATE FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 WHERE VERSION ='-') NVD2 ON NVD.PRODUCT = NVD2.PRODUCT AND NVD.VENDOR = NVD2.VENDOR WHERE (NVD.CVSS_SCORE != NVD2.CVSS_SCORE OR NVD2.PRODUCT IS NULL)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 (PRODUCT, VERSION, VENDOR, CVE_ID, CVSS_SCORE, VULN_SUMMARY, MODI_DATE) SELECT NVD.PRODUCT, '-' AS VERSION, NVD.VENDOR, NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.CVSS_SCORE, NVD.VULN_SUMMARY, now() AS MODI_DATE FROM (SELECT PRODUCT, VERSION, VENDOR, CVE_ID, CVSS_SCORE, VULN_SUMMARY, MODI_DATE FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 WHERE CONCAT(PRODUCT,'@',CVSS_SCORE) IN (SELECT CONCAT(PRODUCT,'@',MAX(CVSS_SCORE)) AS NVD_KEY FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 GROUP BY PRODUCT) GROUP BY PRODUCT) NVD LEFT JOIN (SELECT PRODUCT, VERSION, VENDOR, CVE_ID, CVSS_SCORE, VULN_SUMMARY, MODI_DATE FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 WHERE VERSION ='-') NVD2 ON NVD.PRODUCT = NVD2.PRODUCT AND NVD.VENDOR = NVD2.VENDOR WHERE (NVD.CVSS_SCORE != NVD2.CVSS_SCORE OR NVD2.PRODUCT IS NULL) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID , CVSS_SCORE = NVD.CVSS_SCORE , VULN_SUMMARY = NVD.VULN_SUMMARY , MODI_DATE = now()
mapper.update: UPDATE OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD1 ON NICK.OSS_NAME = NVD1.PRODUCT INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD2 ON NICK.OSS_NICKNAME = NVD2.PRODUCT SET NVD1.CVSS_SCORE = NVD2.CVSS_SCORE , NVD1.CVE_ID = NVD2.CVE_ID , NVD1.MODI_DATE = now() WHERE NVD1.VERSION = NVD2.VERSION AND NVD2.CVSS_SCORE > NVD1.CVSS_SCORE

UPDATE OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD1 ON NICK.OSS_NAME = NVD1.PRODUCT INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD2 ON NICK.OSS_NICKNAME = NVD2.PRODUCT SET NVD2.CVSS_SCORE = NVD1.CVSS_SCORE , NVD2.CVE_ID = NVD1.CVE_ID , NVD2.MODI_DATE = now() WHERE NVD1.VERSION = NVD2.VERSION AND NVD1.CVSS_SCORE > NVD2.CVSS_SCORE
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD1 ON NICK.OSS_NAME = NVD1.PRODUCT INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD2 ON NICK.OSS_NICKNAME = NVD2.PRODUCT WHERE NVD1.VERSION = NVD2.VERSION AND NVD1.CVSS_SCORE != NVD2.CVSS_SCORE
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO NVD_CPE_MATCH_TEMP (SEQ, CPE23URI, VER_START_INC, VER_END_INC, VER_START_EXC, VER_END_EXC) VALUES
(#{item.cpeSeq},#{item.cpe23Uri},#{item.versionStartIncluding},#{item.versionEndIncluding},#{item.versionStartExcluding},#{item.versionEndExcluding})

INSERT INTO NVD_CPE_MATCH_NAMES_TEMP (SEQ, IDX, CPE23URI) VALUES
(#{item.cpeSeq}, #{item.idx}, #{item.cpe23Uri})

INSERT INTO NVD_CPE_MATCH_TEMP (SEQ, CPE23URI, VER_START_INC, VER_END_INC, VER_START_EXC, VER_END_EXC) VALUES (#{cpeSeq},#{cpe23Uri},#{versionStartIncluding},#{versionEndIncluding},#{versionStartExcluding},#{versionEndExcluding})
INSERT INTO NVD_CPE_MATCH_NAMES_TEMP (SEQ, IDX, CPE23URI) VALUES (#{cpeSeq}, #{idx}, #{cpe23Uri})

INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_TEMP_V3 (PRODUCT, VERSION, CVE_ID, CVSS_SCORE, VULN_SUMMARY, MODI_DATE ) VALUES
(#{item.PRODUCT}, #{item.VERSION}, #{item.CVE_ID}, #{item.CVSS_SCORE}, #{item.VULN_SUMMARY}, #{item.MODI_DATE})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PRODUCT = values(PRODUCT) , VERSION = values(VERSION) , CVE_ID = values(CVE_ID) , CVSS_SCORE = values(CVSS_SCORE) , VULN_SUMMARY = values(VULN_SUMMARY) , MODI_DATE = values(MODI_DATE)
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS NVD_CPE_MATCH_TEMP LIKE NVD_CPE_MATCH
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS NVD_CPE_MATCH_NAMES_TEMP LIKE NVD_CPE_MATCH_NAMES
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NVD_CPE_MATCH SELECT * FROM NVD_CPE_MATCH_TEMP
INSERT INTO NVD_CPE_MATCH_NAMES SELECT * FROM NVD_CPE_MATCH_NAMES_TEMP
